analyzer/src/data_quality/MDQ_muScTDiff.cpp

00001 /********************************************************************\
00002 
00003 Name:         MDQ_muScTDiff
00004 Created by:   Andrew Edmonds
00005 
00006 Contents:     hDQ_muScTDiff_[DetName]_[BankName]
00007               - plots the time differences (in ns) between the pulses in the muSc and each detector
00008 
00009 \********************************************************************/
00010

00018 #include <cmath>

00021 #include "midas.h"

00032 using std::string;
00033 using std::map;
00034 using std::vector;
00035 using std::pair;

00038 INT  MDQ_muScTDiff_init(void);
00039 INT  MDQ_muScTDiff(EVENT_HEADER*, void*);

00042 extern HNDLE hDB;
00043 extern TGlobalData* gData;
00044 extern TSetupData* gSetup;
00045 
00046 map <std::string, TH1F*> DQ_muScTDiff_histograms_map;
00047 map <std::string, TH1F*> DQ_muScTDiff_histograms_normalised_map;
00048 float axis_limit = 50000;
00049 
00050 extern TH1F* hDQ_TDCCheck_muSc;

00068 INT MDQ_muScTDiff_init()
00069 {
00070     // See if the DataQuality_LowLevel/ directory already exists
00071   if (!gDirectory->Cd("DataQuality_LowLevel")) {
00072     
00073     std::string dir_name("DataQuality_LowLevel/");
00074     gDirectory->mkdir(dir_name.c_str());
00075     gDirectory->Cd(dir_name.c_str());
00076   }
00077 
00078   // Create a histogram for each detector
00079   std::map<std::string, std::string> bank_to_detector_map = gSetup->fBankToDetectorMap;
00080   for(std::map<std::string, std::string>::iterator mapIter = bank_to_detector_map.begin(); 
00081       mapIter != bank_to_detector_map.end(); mapIter++) { 
00082 
00083     std::string bankname = mapIter->first;
00084     std::string detname = gSetup->GetDetectorName(bankname);
00085 
00086     // hDQ_muScTDiff_[DetName]_[BankName]
00087     std::string histname = "hDQ_muScTDiff_" + detname + "_" + bankname;
00088     std::string histtitle = "Time differences between muSc and " + detname;
00089     TH1F* hDQ_Histogram = new TH1F(histname.c_str(), histtitle.c_str(), 20000, -axis_limit, axis_limit);
00090     std::string axislabel = "Time Difference (muSc - " + detname + ") [ns]";
00091     hDQ_Histogram->GetXaxis()->SetTitle(axislabel.c_str());
00092     hDQ_Histogram->GetYaxis()->SetTitle("Number of TPulseIslands");
00093     DQ_muScTDiff_histograms_map[bankname] = hDQ_Histogram;
00094 
00095     // The normalised histogram
00096     histname += "_normalised";
00097     histtitle += " (normalised)";
00098     TH1F* hDQ_Histogram_Normalised = new TH1F(histname.c_str(), histtitle.c_str(), 20000, -axis_limit, axis_limit);
00099     hDQ_Histogram_Normalised->GetXaxis()->SetTitle(axislabel.c_str());
00100     std::string yaxislabel = hDQ_Histogram->GetYaxis()->GetTitle();
00101     yaxislabel += " per TDC muSc Hit";
00102     hDQ_Histogram_Normalised->GetYaxis()->SetTitle(yaxislabel.c_str());
00103     DQ_muScTDiff_histograms_normalised_map[bankname] = hDQ_Histogram_Normalised;
00104   }
00105 
00106   gDirectory->Cd("/MidasHists/");
00107   return SUCCESS;
00108 }
00109 
00112 INT MDQ_muScTDiff_eor(INT run_number) {
00113 
00114   // Some typedefs
00115   typedef map<string, vector<TPulseIsland*> > TStringPulseIslandMap;
00116   typedef pair<string, vector<TPulseIsland*> > TStringPulseIslandPair;
00117   typedef map<string, vector<TPulseIsland*> >::iterator map_iterator;
00118   
00119   // Fetch a reference to the gData structure that stores a map
00120   // of (bank_name, vector<TPulseIsland*>) pairs
00121   TStringPulseIslandMap& pulse_islands_map =
00122     gData->fPulseIslandToChannelMap;
00123 
00124   // Loop over the map and get each bankname, vector pair
00125   for (map_iterator mapIter = pulse_islands_map.begin(); mapIter != pulse_islands_map.end(); ++mapIter) {
00126 
00127     std::string bankname = mapIter->first;
00128     std::string detname = gSetup->GetDetectorName(bankname);
00129       
00130     if (DQ_muScTDiff_histograms_normalised_map.find(bankname) != DQ_muScTDiff_histograms_normalised_map.end()) {
00131 
00132       // Normalise to the muSc hits
00133       DQ_muScTDiff_histograms_normalised_map[bankname]->Scale(1./hDQ_TDCCheck_muSc->GetEntries());
00134     }
00135   }
00136 
00137   return SUCCESS;
00138 }
00139 
00142 INT MDQ_muScTDiff(EVENT_HEADER *pheader, void *pevent)
00143 {
00144         // Get the event number
00145         int midas_event_number = pheader->serial_number;
00146 
00147         // Some typedefs
00148         typedef map<string, vector<TPulseIsland*> > TStringPulseIslandMap;
00149         typedef pair<string, vector<TPulseIsland*> > TStringPulseIslandPair;
00150         typedef map<string, vector<TPulseIsland*> >::iterator map_iterator;
00151 
00152         // Fetch a reference to the gData structure that stores a map
00153         // of (bank_name, vector<TPulseIsland*>) pairs
00154         TStringPulseIslandMap& pulse_islands_map =
00155                 gData->fPulseIslandToChannelMap;
00156 
00157         // Get the muSc pulses
00158         std::string muSc_bankname = gSetup->GetBankName("muSc");
00159         std::vector<TPulseIsland*> theMuScPulses = pulse_islands_map[muSc_bankname];
00160 
00161         // Loop over the map and get each bankname, vector pair
00162         for (map_iterator mapIter = pulse_islands_map.begin(); mapIter != pulse_islands_map.end(); ++mapIter) 
00163           {
00164             std::string bankname = mapIter->first;
00165             std::string detname = gSetup->GetDetectorName(bankname);
00166             
00167             // Don't bother comparing muSc to muSc
00168             if (detname == "muSc")
00169               continue;
00170 
00171             std::vector<TPulseIsland*> thePulses = mapIter->second;
00172                         
00173             // Make sure the histograms exist (put here so that it find() only called once per detector)
00174             if (DQ_muScTDiff_histograms_map.find(bankname) != DQ_muScTDiff_histograms_map.end()) {
00175 
00176               // Loop over the muSc pulses
00177               for (std::vector<TPulseIsland*>::iterator muScPulseIter = theMuScPulses.begin(); muScPulseIter != theMuScPulses.end(); ++muScPulseIter) {
00178 
00179                 // Loop over the TPulseIslands and plot the histogram
00180                 for (std::vector<TPulseIsland*>::iterator pulseIter = thePulses.begin(); pulseIter != thePulses.end(); ++pulseIter) {
00181 
00182                   // Get the pulse times for the muSc pulse and the detector pulse
00183                   double muSc_time = (*muScPulseIter)->GetPulseTime();
00184                   double det_time = (*pulseIter)->GetPulseTime();
00185                   double tdiff = muSc_time - det_time;
00186 
00187                   // The pulses should be time-ordered so if the tdiff goes outside of the axis range, then we can just skip to the next muSc pulse
00188                   if (std::fabs(tdiff) > axis_limit)
00189                     break;
00190 
00191                   // Fill the histogram
00192                   DQ_muScTDiff_histograms_map[bankname]->Fill(tdiff);
00193                   DQ_muScTDiff_histograms_normalised_map[bankname]->Fill(tdiff);
00194                 }
00195               }
00196             }
00197           }
00198         return SUCCESS;
00199 }
